content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE mySchema.Metadata
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE mySchema.Metadata (
     Table_Name VARCHAR(MAX), 
     Column_Name VARCHAR(MAX), 
     English_Name VARCHAR(MAX),
     Data_Type VARCHAR(MAX)
) WITH (
         DATA_SOURCE = myStagingContainer,
         LOCATION = 'Metadata/Processed/*.parquet',
         FILE_FORMAT = myParquetFormat
);
